long_description: The women's Marmot Sara Top looks good enough to wear to work, yet is tough enough to take you cragging. Soft, breathable performance knit stretches, blocks sun and dries fast. Polyester/lyocell/spandex fabric also wicks moisture and offers UPF 50+ sun protection. FreshGuard(R) finish offers odor control. Marmot Sara Top features a shirttail hem, ruching at the front and back yoke, and contrast stitching. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Marmot Sara Top looks good enough to wear to work, yet is tough enough to take you cragging. Soft, breathable performance knit stretches, blocks sun and dries fast.
